name: Turtles All The Way Down
tagline: Storing Secrets in the Cloud and in the Data Center
body:
# Turtles All The Way Down #

Want to find out about storing secrets in the Cloud and the Data Center? Come see my talk at [AppSec USA 2015](https://2015.appsecusa.org/) in San Francisco!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
